name: Patchwork Kingdom #733 | Fluncindal
description: Fluncindal is a rare instance of an entire kingdom where all of the 385 schools are connected to the internet (and 31 schools with unavailable data as clouds and birds in the sky), representing the end goal of UNICEF's Giga Project | Created for Giga (GigaConnect.org) — connecting every school in the world — in celebration of UNICEF's 75th birthday, by Nadieh Bremer
